title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: A Creativity-Based Professional Development Project for Early Childhood Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can design three or more creative teaching methods applicable in early childhood education settings based on theories of creativity development
Participants can analyze peer teachers' perception levels of creativity using semi-structured interview techniques and propose educational improvement plans
Participants can develop creativity assessment tools integrable into science education through Project-Based Learning (PBL) and apply them to actual educational contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
